QUENCH.Title: QUENCH
QUENCH.LogTestDetailsHint: Print detailed test results in the console
QUENCH.ExampleTestsHint: Show the included sample tests in the QUENCH window
QUENCH.AutoShowQuenchWindowHint: Will automatically render the Quench window when the game is loaded or refreshed
QUENCH.AutoRunHint: Will automatically run all preselected Quench test batches when the game is loaded or refreshed
QUENCH.CollapseSuccessfulHint: When enabled, suites for which all children suites and tests are passing will be collapsed by default
QUENCH.PreselectFiltersHint: Only batches matching this list of comma-separated filters will effectively be preselected when the world is loaded. Filters are case-insensitive and may contain wildcards (?, *, and **)

WARN.BatchAlreadyExists: QUENCH: Test batch "{key}" already exists. Overwriting...

ERROR.InvalidPackageName: QUENCH: Test batch "{key}" uses invalid package ID "{packageName}". Batch names should begin with the registering package's ID!
